title: Blue discolouration?
content:
Hello,

I'm having some very strange blue discoluration on the right side of my screen. I'm pretty sure it only happens on rasterized content like photos & videos.

If I open any UI menu in Firefox, the effect goes away. I can't figure out what's causing it!

Any ideas would be helpful. Thanks!
creator: taylorcolpitts

title: I'm not sure I have an issue
content:
I believe I was just in the process of adding my Gmail account to my Mozilla account. But I did stop and use the restroom in-between initiating this dialogue and it opening, I could have forgotten my reason... Yes, that quickly. Please forgive any inconvenience I may have caused. Oh!!! I do want to use encryption, but I can set "use https only" myself. I remember!!! It was checking if I had the latest version and I'm not sure why I'm in this area of support. Have a great day or evening!! 

     Thanx
creator: demiskc

title: Unable to interact/open anything on Firefox
content: Hello. I have been having this issue recently with Firefox where, when I Google things and open up Google Images, I am unable to open any photos. No matter how many times I press on the mousepad, I cannot open up an image in Google Images unless I go to the website that image is linked too. Something else is that I cannot open an image in my Google Drive. I am resorted to download the file. I trouble started Firefox today to see if that would work, and it did, but I noticed this problems started up again. I just need some help or direction of what to do from here.
creator: udietz

title: I received an email that I need to verify my account because it says my account will be deleted
content:
I received this email to exhibitdesign@yahoo.com

I always use Mozilla/Firefox for this and have for a few years. It says that I created an account 2 weeks ago.

Here is the email I received:

"A couple of weeks ago you created a Mozilla account, but never confirmed it. For your security, we will delete the account if not verified in the next 24 hours."

Is this a legitimate email?
creator: exhibitdesign
